post.body: OMG so would I. Speaking of which, google thinks I stink. http://tinyurl.com/49r3mu
whoa there's three now; if you catch up to my 11 I'm gonna be pissed.
2 followers now. LOL
What a smart boy!
I had to do some last minute shopping instead. LOL but my feet are up for a few hours anyway :-)
Glad to hear he is alright. Drinks all around...till we are so sloshed we forget the day has ever happened. ;)
Aww sorry to hear that :( Is he ok?
Woot made my favicon :)
was it?
lol thanks for the advice will have to remember it next time
eww
Off to make my house presentable before niece gets here. Google thinks I stink. http://tinyurl.com/49r3mu
Oh and to cook, too. That would be kick-ass.
Thinks it's time to break out the Roomba that I bought a year ago and used once. Now need robot to do laundry and clean the shower.
WTF? Here in VA November was a Winter Wonderland but December has been rainy and 50s or 60s. I want a white friggin' Christmas.
doing laundry! finally something productive but shh don't tell anyone. Working later.
back to bed for a nap...will be more productive later. After work this evening.
Don't forget the cooking disasters contest for $25 gift card http://tinyurl.com/4vquoc
Yay I have my pink laptop back and it's finally working. Sony repairs are a ripoff get someone local to do it.
Desperately needs some sleep. My brain is too busy to let me. Need some drugs to knock me out for about a day.
Scaring my cats with all my sneezing. Geez, is it really THAT loud?
First ever contest on http://www.sonotdomestic.com for a $25 gift certificate - please visit and enter. :)
Going to buy a last minute birthday present right before having dinner with friend. I'm terrible. But what to get?
Waiting for the motivation fairy to visit to give me the urge to clean my kitchen.
Win a Blog Makeover courtesy of the Lazy Housewife and My Design Workbench http://tinyurl.com/8jvkke
Working, working working yay
back up working 2 am. Fun stuff. :)
yay finished with work have a lovely Saturday night everyone.
Merry Christmas to all!
Wow I really hate ruined plans. All around this day was major suckage. Santa had better just bring me a HUGE drink.
phew its back. scary!
wtf where did my domain go?
Contest winner announced! http://tinyurl.com/754jhc Congrats Bella Valentina
OMG finished Christmas shopping. Was. Pure. Torture. Much prefer online shopping.
Up for work then sweet sleep at 6 am. Don't forget the contest! http://tinyurl.com/4vquoc
OMG nieces are here what am I supposed to do with 2 giggling teenage girls? Maybe they'll get bored and take a nap. Do 16 yr olds take naps?
